short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View count of unread VeryCD notifications without visiting the site.
short.zh_CN: 无需访问 VeryCD 即可查看未读通知数目。
short.zh_TW: 無須造訪 VeryCD 即可審閱未讀訊息數目

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Too slow opening VeryCD.com and wait for unread numbers to show up?

This simple extension could help you!

Note that you'll need a VeryCD account for this extension to work.

Report your issues here:
https://github.com/xslidian/verycd-unread-count/issues
long.zh_CN:
VeryCD.com 官网的未读消息数总是延迟更新？
这个迷你扩展可以帮您！

请注意：您需要注册 VeryCD 帐号并登录，此扩展才能正常工作。

报告问题: 
https://github.com/xslidian/verycd-unread-count/issues
